Articles.Content:
I thought stuff goes wrong in KSP often enough, that it could use a test pattern. So I made one, hope you enjoy.

Jeb likes rummaging through the costume trunk during his downtime I guess.
I might use this in future KSP videos. Would that be fine by you?

Yeh, go ahead.

Everyone can use this as much as they like.

PM me a link to the video to let me see it in action.
